name: HopsinsMusicBot
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SESSION_NAME.description: Enter the String Session Program for the assistant who goes to VCG

BOT_NAME.description: Enter your MusicPlayer bot name. (free content)

ARQ_API_KEY.description: Take fire from the telegram boat Â»t.me/ARQRobot or @ARQRobot

BG_IMAGE.description: Custom Background Play Music Use Transparent Photos in .png format

API_ID.description: Enter the APP ID. Please retrieve it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Enter the HASH API Please Get it from my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS.description: List of User ID users counted as admin all over the place (separator using space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Maximum audio duration limit for download (minutes).
